main.introduction: Passionate Full Stack Developer with a knack for crafting elegant solutions

intro.title: Let me introduce myself
intro.description: I'm a software developer from Maracaibo, Venezuela with over 3 years of experience building clean, user-friendly digital products. I love turning complex problems into simple, intuitive solutions that make people's lives easier.

passion.title: My Passion for Coding
passion.description: I genuinely enjoy what I do. Coding isn't just my job—it's my favorite way to learn, create, and solve real problems. I'm constantly exploring new tech, pushing my limits, and building things that matter. I'm always on the lookout for new challenges and opportunities to grow.

location.title: Remote & Flexible
location.description: I'm based in Maracaibo, Venezuela and open to remote opportunities worldwide. Time zones aren't a blocker—just a fun puzzle.

contact.title: Here to Help
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? We can work together to bring your ideas to life!
contact.emailText: Feel free to reach out via email at

projects.title: Featured work
projects.subtitle: A selection of products I've helped launch and evolve. Each one balances thoughtful UX with resilient engineering so teams can keep scaling with confidence.

items.name: Pulse
items.description: Pulse is a fitness management platform built with React Native and Expo that gives trainers one command center for programs, payments, and client progress analytics.

items.name: SLIVE.AI
items.description: SLIVE.AI unifies ERP operations, social collaboration, and conversational AI to help enterprises orchestrate their people, processes, and decisions in real time.

items.name: Burger Smoke
items.description: Burger Smoke is a lightweight ordering experience that turns a dynamic web menu into WhatsApp-ready takeout requests for fast-moving local businesses.
